pageContext.title: An interview with the first person Jeff Bezos hired at Amazon
pageContext.content: Shel Kaphan was the first person Jeff Bezos hired to launch Amazon.com. A lot of people consider Kaphan to be a co-founder in all but name. Along with Paul Davis, Kaphan was largely responsible for the entire technical architecture that Amazon launched with, from the website to the back-end systems that made selling books on the Internet possible.

seo.title: An interview with the first person Jeff Bezos hired for Amazon
seo.description: Bezos called him the most important person who’s ever worked at Amazon.
